name: NoHeadTrash
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Greg is your No Head-Trash Guide to daily inspiration. Every day begins with the opportunity for momentum and we believe it is found by Breaking Free from the Head Trash that is holding you back. We help you move foward with a smile, confidence and the seed of positive belief that you can move from where you are to where you want to be NOW - from Breakdown to Breakthrough - from Impossible to UNSTOPPABLE. 

Greg is a speaker, trainer and author of 5 books. He has experienced powerful success and failure, including a year in prison where his move to Breakthrough began. Owning 14 businesses with hundreds of employees left Greg isolated and he is determined to share the message of Success that includes SIGNIFICANCE, satisfaction, and joy in all 5 Opportunities of life. Health, Mindset, Relationships, Faith and Finances. 

Greg is the founder of Breakthrough Leadership and The No Head Trash Nation - a Free Facebook group. You can visit Greg at www.noheadtrash.com or email him greg@noheadtrash.com. 

Connect with Greg to Break Free using simple steps on a daily basis that move you toward Breakthrough.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
